attributes.action: Commence no military action in Syria without a parliamentary vote
attributes.additional_details: We ask that any military action in the Middle East is subject to a detailed level of scrutiny within a cross-party parliamentary task force, in addition to any decision being put to a parliamentary vote - have we learnt nothing from our previous war-mongering in the Middle East.
attributes.background: Theresa May has stated that she is prepared to start a military campaign in Syria, without a democratic vote, and potentially against the will of parliament and he electorate
